```{r}
owid_co2_data %>%
          group_by(country) %>%
          filter(year > "1949") %>%
     select( country)
```

```{r}
owid_co2_data %>%
  mutate(example_countries <- "United Sates, China")
```
```{r}
     ggplot(owid_co2_data, aes(x= year, y=co2, color=country)) +
     geom_line() +
       xlim(1950, 2021)
```
